title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.24 - Final board action
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.24 - Final board action

State Regulations

Unless a party files exceptions in accordance with this

Part, the decision, report, order, ruling, finding or other determination, or
any part thereof will be final, except that the board may, on its own motion, decide to review the remedial action recommended under an unfair labor practice
charge within 45 working days after receipt by the parties of the decision and
recommended order. A remedial order of a hearing officer in an unfair labor
practice charge that is not, or is no longer, subject to review by the board as
provided in this Part, shall be deemed to be a final order of the board for
purposes of enforcement proceedings under section 707 of SERA and section
253.27
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
253.24

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
